      • getStyleUrl

        public java.net.URL getStyleUrl​(ViewContext context,
                                ScreenType screenType)

      • showScreen

        public void showScreen​(ViewContext context,
                       ScreenType screenType)
        Shows a screen based on the View Type
        Parameters:
        context - An instance of the view context to clear and add the new screen
        screenType - The ScreenType of the requested screen

      • loadScreenWithController

        public View loadScreenWithController​(ViewContext context,
                                     ScreenType screenType)
        Loads a screen including the according controller based on a screen type. If the screen type is unknown by this function, an error will logged.
        Parameters:
        context - An instance of the ViewContext to load the screen and its controller
        screenType - the screen type to load
        Returns:
        an initialized screen object based on the screen type.

      • buildView

        public View<javafx.scene.Node> buildView​(java.lang.ClassLoader classloader,
                                         java.lang.String fxmlPath,
                                         ScreenType screenType)
        Builds a screen object based on the fxml path and the according screen type
        Parameters:
        classloader - An instance of a classloader to access files
        fxmlPath - The relative path to the fxml layout file with base src/main/resources/
        screenType - The screen type to load
        Returns:
        An initialized View object with a loaded fxml file.

      • buildScene

        public javafx.scene.Scene buildScene​(ViewContext context)
        Builds a nwe scene based on the AnchorPane. The Global Style File will be added to the stylesheet-chain.
        Parameters:
        context - The View Context with a valid root node inside
        Returns:
        The built scene, ready to show.

      • addStatusBar

        public StatusController addStatusBar​(ViewContext context)
        Adds a new Statusbar to the bottom screen
        Parameters:
        context - An instance of a ViewContext to add the statusbar
        Returns:
        The status controller to manage the notifications

      • getFilePath

        public java.lang.String getFilePath​(java.lang.String baseBath,
                                    ScreenType screenType,
                                    java.lang.String fileType)
        Generates a full relative path to the fxml file based on the screen type.
        Parameters:
        baseBath - The base path, the file is located at
        fileType - The file type (ending) of the file
        screenType - The screen type of the fxml file
        Returns:
        A full relative path string to the fxml file of this screen type.

      • addNode

        public void addNode​(ViewContext context,
                    javafx.scene.Node node)
        Adds a Node to the Main Anchor Pane
        Parameters:
        context - A instance ot the ViewContext to add the node to
        node - A Node to add to the root layout

      • centerStageOnScreen

        public void centerStageOnScreen​(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
        Centers a Window on the View
        Parameters:
        primaryStage - The primary stage is used to center the window on the screen

      • clearScreen

        public void clearScreen​(ViewContext context)
        Replaces the current layout with a new JavaFX Node. If the Root View has existing child, they will be removed first.
        Parameters:
        context - An instance of the ViewContext to have access to the root node

      • getImage

        public javafx.scene.image.Image getImage​(java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader,
                                         java.lang.String subPath,
                                         java.lang.String key,
                                         java.lang.String fileExt)
        Loads an Image from resources
        Parameters:
        classLoader - An instance of the main class loader, to load the files from resource.
        subPath - The sub-path in the base image folder eg. "icons/"
        key - filename (lowercase)
        fileExt - file ending eg. "png"
        Returns:
        An initialized Image Object

      • renderImageView

        public javafx.scene.image.ImageView renderImageView​(java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader,
                                                    java.lang.String subPath,
                                                    java.lang.String imageKey,
                                                    java.lang.String fileExt,
                                                    java.lang.Double height,
                                                    java.lang.Double width)
        Renders the Image View based on the Image key and file extension
        Parameters:
        classLoader - The class loader instance to load the files
        subPath - The sub directory, the image is stored in
        imageKey - The unique image name without file extension
        fileExt - The file extension of the image
        height - An optional fit height of the image view
        width - An optional fit width of the image view
        Returns:
        An Image View based on the Serve Type with an image loaded and resized it.
